## User-Story

**As a**
[type of user]

**, I want**
[goal or objective of the user]

**so that**
[benefit and value the feature should achieve]
.

_Acceptance Criteria:_

- [ ] Criteria 1

_Tasks:_

- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] #LinkedIssueNumber

_Description:_
Context, Implementation, ...
